channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: A New ‘Super Mario Galaxy’ Trailer Unleashes Yoshi
item.description: Everyone's favorite dino buddy is joining the cast of 'Super Mario Galaxy,' and he looks adooooorable.

item.title: Sony’s first clip earbuds don’t quite hit the mark
item.description: The Sony LinkBuds Clip are the company's first clip earbuds. They follow the innovative donut-hole LinkBuds and LinkBuds Open and, like their predecessors, allow you to listen to music or podcasts, make phone calls, or be active outdoors while still maintaining awareness of your surroundings. The clip design has become more popular over the past […]...

item.title: What is the release date for Tell Me Lies season 3 episode 5 on Hulu and Disney+?
item.description: Can Stephen's behavior get any worse? You bet. But will it be in Tell Me Lies season 3 episode 5, and when does it drop on Hulu and Disney+?

item.title: Why is Wonder Man being released in full on Disney+? The new Marvel TV show's head writer has his say
item.description: Wonder Man's showrunner believes there are "positives and negatives" to the MCU TV show's unusual release format.

item.title: Google Chrome is stopping updates and support for these older Macs – here's what you need to know
item.description: If you're running an older Mac or MacBook, you might have to think about an upgrade if you want to keep using Chrome.

item.title: Beware, hackers have hijacked OpenAI’s 'invite your team' feature to break into your business
item.description: Kaspersky warns of scam using OpenAI invitations to send deceptive emails, promoting fraudulent offers, and vishing to steal data.

item.title: The great e-bike crackdown has begun
item.description: This is The Stepback, a weekly newsletter breaking down one essential story from the tech world. For more on the e-bike movement, follow Andrew J. Hawkins. The Stepback arrives in our subscribers' inboxes at 8AM ET. Opt in for The Stepback here. How it started Last week, I did something I don't typically do, which […]

item.title: Arsenal vs Man Utd Live Streams: How to watch Premier League 2025-26 from anywhere in the world
item.description: All the ways to watch Arsenal vs Man Utd live streams online and from anywhere, as the title-chasing Gunners welcome the Red Devils to the Emirates.

item.title: We now know the magic behind Samsung new brighter OLED TV tech, but it still hasn’t solved the biggest problem
item.description: Samsung's QD-OLED TVs are only going to get brighter, but still aren't taking over the OLED market – there seems to be a clear reason why.

item.title: Fix Your Shit: Blue Diamond almonds
item.description: The new column, ‘Fix Your Shit,’ challenges companies who’ve created problems ranging from trivial to travesty to ‘do better.’ It’s 9:30 p.m. Snack time. A sacred fourth meal, when I pull out my handwash-only kobachi and drop in a small handful of Blue Diamond Smokehouse almonds. I’ve been eating them for more years than I care to admit, appreciating the mix of natural (high protein and fiber) almonds with a splash of addictive processing (mmm, hickory smoke flavor and maltodextrin) to keep them feeling dangerous. ...

item.title: Ces essais impressionnants montrent pourquoi atterrir sur Mars n’a rien d’un détail
item.description: Alors que la mission ExoMars 2028 se profile à l'horizon, Thales Alenia Space et Airbus se préparent à relever le défi complexe de l'atterrissage sur la Planète rouge. Dans un contexte marqué par des échecs passés, les ingénieurs s’engagent dans des tests rigoureux pour garantir la sécurité du...

item.title: Test du MSI MPG 274URDFW E16M : le meilleur écran Mini-Led pour les joueurs sur PC ?
item.description: MSI sort son premier écran Mini-LED avec le MSI MPG 274URDFW E16M, un modèle Dual Mode qui s'adapte à la fois aux jeux compétitifs et immersifs. Tient-on là l'écran Mini-Led parfait pour le jeu vidéo ?
